>
[Ghost Lantern](/Equipment.aspx?ID=2191)
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Light" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=100" />
<trait label="Magical" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=103" />

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Treasure Vault](/Sources.aspx?ID=191) pg. 115 <sup>2.0</sup>

**Price** 1,850 gp

<row gap="medium">

**Usage** held in 1 hand

**Bulk** L
</row>

<row gap="medium">

 

 

 
</row>

</column>

---

Crafted from [cold iron](/Equipment.aspx?ID=2916), this black hooded [lantern](/Equipment.aspx?ID=2730) has gray glass and lenses that emit a pale gray light when the lantern is lit. Anything this light falls on looks gray or desaturated. The lantern uses oil as a standard hooded lantern. The lantern’s light shines within the [Ethereal Plane](/Planes.aspx?ID=34) as well as [the Universe](/Planes.aspx?ID=26). On any other plane, the light functions as a normal hooded lantern.

**Activate** <actions string="Single Action" /> ([concentrate](/Traits.aspx?ID=561)) **Frequency** once per day;  **Requirements** The lantern's shutters are open; **Effect** You concentrate on the lantern’s light to soften the boundary between the [Ethereal Plane](/Planes.aspx?ID=34) and [the Universe](/Planes.aspx?ID=26). Any creature in the lantern’s bright light on the Universe gains the effects of the [_ghost touch_](/Equipment.aspx?ID=2840) property rune on all its weapons and unarmed attacks. If an affected weapon or attack is [magical](/Traits.aspx?ID=644) and already has the maximum number of property runes, the wielder can choose one to suppress to gain ghost touch. This benefit lasts for 5 minutes or until the shutters are closed, whichever comes first. It applies to a creature only while it’s in the lantern’s [bright light](/Rules.aspx?ID=2402), and if the creature leaves the light and returns it regains the benefit once more.
